parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: filter by api entity, example: pipeline, account

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: filter by api entity id, this value different for each action, example: email, user id

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: filter by api action, get possible values on /api/audit/entitiesList, you will see only actions which was happen in your account

parameters.name: showTriggers
parameters.description: returns only actions related to receiving triggers

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: filter by searching substring in request body or query or params or headers or url

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: filter by date, value is number of milliseconds since 1970

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: filter by date, value is number of milliseconds since 1970

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: name of sorting field, values: id, createdAt, updatedAt
